post.body: ---- true life can suck but you have to suck it before it sucks you I say! come on love pull yourself together. ONWARDS!!!!! xxx
- kiss it bitch!!!!! : ) xx
this is ridiculous. decent people should boycott places like this. leave all the pretty pretentious wankers to it. muppets!
i will send you some MP3's tomorrow. i have stuff on myspace but will send some newer stuff to you!
has jst been introduced to the weirdness of laurie anderson http://tinyurl.com/4o9l65
feeling solsticey...? x
thinks johnny nigma - the visuals / comedian / elf is worth his weight in gold
http://tinyurl.com/6mya6z
alienating my entire family one by one by being unemployed, not believeing in the future of money and for not having faith in the system ah
watching the big lebowski : ) whilst ironing : ( but getting paid for it : ) : )
inspired by some cool words of wisdom today and is gutted the documentary Blondie: One Way Or Another is not availalable on bbc iplayer.boo!
intrigued by FUCK BUTTONS - cosmic hehehe aint listened to them before pleased to hear these nice sounds xxxx
is wondering how ATP's always get it right! Like in May... Jesus Lizard +Devo show curated by the Breeders!How cool can it get!Wish I had Â£
need2 get all my music made so far onto cd/digital download as a collection so i can move on wiv new material.also wana press a pink vinyl!
can't sleep. listenin 2 nine black alps. summin bout their safe easy poppy sounds that comfort me. i like : ) www.myspace.com/nineblackalps
LOVING THE NEW PAD!!!! YAY!!! xxxxxxxxx
listening the the lovely wish fulfillment demo by sonic youth on their myspace http://www.myspace.com/sonicyouth
moving today! Won't have internet. Was gona leave my computer here 2 go online but I gona take it wiv me 2 lose myself in making music x bye
just wrote review of the ARIEl / BOSCH gig http://tinyurl.com/6yk6we it 2 long tho!
off to the Rocking Chair in Cardiff for a night of weird experimental music xxx
thinks tantrum remix lab on facebook is brilliant! http://tinyurl.com/9nrq38
checking out art by tracey moberley www.sanderswood.com very good!!! x
is pondering the weirdness of coed hills... emaciated naked hippies, posh money grabbing hippies, a crying tree man and a resident creep. hm
looking forward to getting out of the city for the winter solstice ...
